script.source: if (doc.containsKey('client_geo.asn') && doc['client_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('client_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['client_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['client_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['client_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }

if (doc.containsKey('source_geo.asn') && doc['source_geo.asn'].size() != 0 && doc.containsKey('source_geo.as_org.keyword') && doc['source_geo.as_org.keyword'].size() != 0) { String m = 'ASN' + doc['source_geo.asn'].value + ': ' + doc['source_geo.as_org.keyword']; emit(m); }
